paramInformation.label: Dim Level Sent via Basic Set
paramInformation.description: The dim level sent to a lamp module upon activation: (0) Off; (1)-(99) Dim Level

paramInformation.label: Temperature Trigger ON value
paramInformation.description: Temperature level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Trigger OFF value
paramInformation.description: Temperature level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Trigger ON value
paramInformation.description: Humidity level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Trigger OFF value
paramInformation.description: Humidity level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

paramInformation.label: Auto report time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time interval when a sensor report is sent

paramInformation.label: Auto report temperature
paramInformation.description: Sets the temperature change causing a sensor report.

paramInformation.label: Auto report humidity
paramInformation.description: Sets the humidity change causing a sensor report.
